EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: GoDirect Connectivity Conference in London, UK
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the GoDirect Connectivity Conference in London, UK. Please save this email for future reference.
Event: GoDirect Connectivity Conference Date: Thursday, February 21, 2019 Time: 09:00 - 17:00 Location: HILTON London Tower Bridge Address: 5 More London Place, Tooley St, London, SE1 2BY, UK
We look forward to meeting you at the event.
Sincerely, Honeywell GoDirect Team godirect@honeywell.com <[[mailto:godirect@honeywell.com]]>
